Ceci n’est pas un site Web d'une page

We are Rob Safar and we’re paying for the domain situationi.st. We’re not really proper situationists - like who doesn’t love a bit of Guy Debord anyway - but we totally like thinking outside the box and figured Hey! That’s loads in common. More than enough to use it as a catchy title.
Not as a business name though.

We’re Rob Safar, and always will be.

  • Rob Safar


    Technology Toucher

We pride ourselves on our talent for micro-synergistic node linking solutions. Networked-communications, cyber-relationships, E-motions. Ever noticed that the pens on your desk weren’t neatly aligned with each other and couldn’t help but rearrange them? Imagine these pens aren’t pens but strategic decisions.
Exactly.

We’re huge fans of parallaxparallel stationery, and we can help you to get (and keep) a grip on your E-motional wellbeing.
